actions.text: Amendment SA 4916 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4916 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR S9092; text: CR S9092) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy, up to $300,000 for independent testing of the Joint Improvised Explosive Device Neutralizer III.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4916 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4916 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Cochran.

purpose: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy, up to $300,000 for independent testing of the Joint Improvised Explosive Device Neutralizer III.
